page.title: 20PENNARD PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: OUR SCHOOL WAS OPENED IN 1967 AND MR WILLIAMS OUR OLD HEADMASTER OPENED IT. THERE ARE 280 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL INCLUDING THE NURSERY. THERE ARE 11 TEACHERS WORKING HERE. IN THE CANTEEN 3 COOKS MAKE SCHOOL DINNERS.THEY START WORK AT 7.30 AM AND FINISH AT 2.30 IN THE AFTERNOON. AT DINNER PLAY 4 LADIES LOOK AFTER THE CHILDREN. SOME CHILDREN HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS AND SOME HAVE SANDWICHES OR GO HOME. THE SWIMMING POOL WAS PAID FOR BY THE PARENTS ASSOCIATION AND THE GLAMORGAN COUNTY COUNCIL AND HAS BEEN OPENED FOR 13 YEARS. SCHOOL STARTS AT 9.00 AM.IF THE BELL HAS NOT GONE WE PLAY OUTSIDE. WE HAVE ASSEMBLY IN THE HALL ON FRIDAYS AND WEDNESDAYS. WE USUALLY DO MATHS BEFORE MORNING BREAK AND ENGLISH AFTER. BREAK IS FROM 10.30 UNTIL 10.45 AM AND LUNCH IS FROM 12.00 UNTIL 1.00PM.WE FINISH SCHOOL AT 3.30PM.
